scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:background && npm run copy-css
scripts.build:bundle: browserify src/app.js --extension=.jsx -o extension/bundle.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:background: browserify src/background.js -o extension/background.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch: npm run watch:bundle & npm run watch:background
scripts.watch:bundle: watchify src/app.js --extension=.jsx -o extension/bundle.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch:background: watchify src/background.js -o extension/background.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
